channel.title: Sports
channel.description: Sports news and scores, covering the NBA, NFL, MLB, NHL college and high school sports teams, Dodgers, Lakers, Angels, Clippers, Rams, Chargers, USC, UCLA, boxing and more.

item.title: High school sports participation drops 4% nationally in first survey since 2018-19
item.dc:creator: Eric Sondheimer
item.description: The first national participation survey in three years for high school sports shows a decline of 4% across the country.
item.content:encoded: The first national participation survey in three years for high school sports shows a decline of 4% across the country.

media:content.media:description: Costa Mesa, CA - August 19: Gardena Serra running back Jamar Bell-Gonzalez gains yardage as Orange Lutheran cornerback Keon Washington, left, and defensive linebacker Jojo Edwards close in during the second quarter of the high school football opener at Lebard Stadium in Costa Mesa on Friday, Aug. 19, 2022. (Allen J. Schaben / Los Angeles Times)

item.title: Santa Margarita vs. Los Alamitos heads this week's top high school football games
item.dc:creator: Eric Sondheimer
item.description: A look at this week's top high school football games in the Southland, including Santa Margarita vs. Los Alamitos.
item.content:encoded: A look at this week's top high school football games in the Southland, including Santa Margarita vs. Los Alamitos.

media:content.media:description: WESTMINSTER, CALIF. - OCT. 7, 2021. Los Alamitos quarterback Malachi Nelson looks to throw downfield against Edison in the first half on Thurssday night, Oct. 7, 2021. (Luis Sinco / Los Angeles Times)

item.title: 'That shouldn't have gone up': Chip Kelly says tweet calling UCLA 'Transfer U' was a mistake
item.dc:creator: Ben Bolch
item.description: The nickname 'Transfer U' surfaced on the official UCLA football Twitter account and sparked an uproar from fans. Coach Chip Kelly said the tweet was a mistake.
item.content:encoded: The nickname 'Transfer U' surfaced on the official UCLA football Twitter account and sparked an uproar from fans. Coach Chip Kelly said the tweet was a mistake.

media:content.media:description: UCLA head coach Chip Kelly watches from the sideline during the first half of an NCAA college football game against Bowling Green Saturday, Sept. 3, 2022, in Pasadena, Calif. (AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill)

item.title: U.S. men's soccer team missing key players to injury ahead of World Cup warm-up matches
item.dc:creator: Kevin Baxter
item.description: Four players who figured to compete for starting spots at the World Cup this fall are missing from the roster U.S. coach Gregg Berhalter has summoned.
item.content:encoded: Four players who figured to compete for starting spots at the World Cup this fall are missing from the roster U.S. coach Gregg Berhalter has summoned.

media:content.media:description: United States head coach Gregg Berhalter looks on after a FIFA World Cup qualifying soccer match against El Salvador, Thursday, Jan. 27, 2022, in Columbus, Ohio. The U.S. won 1-0. (AP Photo/Julio Cortez)

item.title: UCLA gives rise to the comeback tale of transfer linebacker Laiatu Latu
item.dc:creator: Ben Bolch
item.description: It took two years for UCLA's Laiatu Latu to get a doctor's permission to play after a neck injury. The comeback culminated in two sacks Saturday.
item.content:encoded: It took two years for UCLA's Laiatu Latu to get a doctor's permission to play after a neck injury. The comeback culminated in two sacks Saturday.

media:content.media:description: UCLA linebacker Laiatu Latu looks for a sack against Alabama State on Sept. 10 at the Rose Bowl.

item.title: The Dodgers are in the playoffs again. So who will they play?
item.dc:creator: Hans Tesselaar
item.description: The Dodgers have qualified for the playoffs for the 10th consecutive season, but it's going to be some time before they know who their opponent will be.
item.content:encoded: The Dodgers have qualified for the playoffs for the 10th consecutive season, but it's going to be some time before they know who their opponent will be.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts, front, cheers with the team in the background after the Dodgers' baseball game against the Arizona Diamondbacks in Phoenix, Tuesday, Sept. 13, 2022. The Dodgers won 4-0 and clinched the National League West. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin)

item.title: Column: Southern California natives are ready for their Ivy League football moments
item.dc:creator: Eric Sondheimer
item.description: Chaminade High grad and Harvard kicker Jonah Lipel talks about the Ivy League experience in the ever-changing world of college football and NIL deals.
item.content:encoded: Chaminade High grad and Harvard kicker Jonah Lipel talks about the Ivy League experience in the ever-changing world of college football and NIL deals.

media:content.media:description: The Ivy League returns to action his weekend, including former Chaminade kicker Jonah Lipel of Harvard.

item.title: Trevor Bauer argues new video shows accuser 'smirking and uninjured' after encounter
item.dc:creator: Bill Shaikin
item.description: Trevor Bauer's attorneys argue a new cellphone video obtained from the Pasadena police shows the woman who accused him of sexual assault uninjured.
item.content:encoded: Trevor Bauer's attorneys argue a new cellphone video obtained from the Pasadena police shows the woman who accused him of sexual assault uninjured.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Trevor Bauer (27) throws to an Atlanta Braves batter in the first inning of a baseball game Sunday, June 6, 2021, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/Brynn Anderson)

item.title: Dodgers clinch NL West for ninth time in 10 seasons with win over Diamondbacks
item.dc:creator: Jack Harris
item.description: The Dodgers defeated the Arizona Diamondbacks 4-0 on Tuesday to become the first team in the majors to win their division.
item.content:encoded: The Dodgers defeated the Arizona Diamondbacks 4-0 on Tuesday to become the first team in the majors to win their division.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts, front, cheers with the team in the background after the Dodgers' baseball game against the Arizona Diamondbacks in Phoenix, Tuesday, Sept. 13, 2022. The Dodgers won 4-0 and clinched the National League West. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin)

item.title: Shaikin: Winning a division might be routine for Dodgers, but it should still be treasured
item.dc:creator: Bill Shaikin
item.description: The Dodgers have captured the NL West title for the ninth time in 10 seasons, a feat that seems easy when it's anything but.
item.content:encoded: The Dodgers have captured the NL West title for the ninth time in 10 seasons, a feat that seems easy when it's anything but.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Dodgers celebrate in the locker room after a 4-0 win in a baseball game against the Arizona Diamondbacks in Phoenix, Tuesday, Sept. 13, 2022. The Dodgers clinched the National League West. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin)

item.title: Carlos Vela scores tying goal as LAFC draws Minnesota United
item.dc:creator: Kevin Baxter
item.description: Carlos Vela scored the tying goal in the 64th minute for LAFC in a 1-1 road draw against Minnesota United on Tuesday night.
item.content:encoded: Carlos Vela scored the tying goal in the 64th minute for LAFC in a 1-1 road draw against Minnesota United on Tuesday night.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles FC forward Carlos Vela (10) controls the ball during the second half of the team's MLS soccer match against FC Dallas in Los Angeles, Wednesday, June 29, 2022. Los Angeles won 3-1. (AP Photo/Ringo H.W. Chiu)

item.title: Mater Dei rejects offer to move game against St. John Bosco to SoFi Stadium
item.dc:creator: Eric Sondheimer
item.description: Mater Dei released a statement on Tuesday saying that the Monarchs will play St. John Bosco on Oct. 7 at Santa Ana Stadium.
item.content:encoded: Mater Dei released a statement on Tuesday saying that the Monarchs will play St. John Bosco on Oct. 7 at Santa Ana Stadium.

media:content.media:description: SoFi Stadium, home for the Rams and Chargers, will be the site for the St. John Bosco vs. Mater Dei high school football game on Oct. 7.

item.title: Mike Trout's home run streak ends, but he still shows he's one of baseball's best
item.dc:creator: Sarah Valenzuela
item.description: Slugger Mike Trout's home run steak ended at seven games, one shy of the record, in the Angels' 3-1 loss to the Guardians on Tuesday in Cleveland.
item.content:encoded: Slugger Mike Trout's home run steak ended at seven games, one shy of the record, in the Angels' 3-1 loss to the Guardians on Tuesday in Cleveland.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Angels' Mike Trout flies out during the fifth inning of the team's baseball game against the Cleveland Guardians, Tuesday, Sept. 13, 2022, in Cleveland. (AP Photo/David Dermer)

item.title: Chargers hope for more consistency in run game against Chiefs
item.dc:creator: Jeff Miller
item.description: Offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi said he would like to see 'a little more consistency' in the Chargers' rushing attack Thursday at Kansas City.
item.content:encoded: Offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi said he would like to see 'a little more consistency' in the Chargers' rushing attack Thursday at Kansas City.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles Chargers running back Austin Ekeler (30) runs against the Las Vegas Raiders during the second half of an NFL football game in Inglewood, Calif., Sunday, Sept. 11, 2022. (AP Photo/Marcio Jose Sanchez)

item.title: Lincoln Riley trusts corner Mekhi Blackmon. 'We like him matched up against anybody'
item.dc:creator: Ryan Kartje
item.description: USC coach Lincoln Riley praised cornerback Mekhi Blackmon, who handled being targeted by Stanford 10 times during the Trojans' win over the Cardinal.
item.content:encoded: USC coach Lincoln Riley praised cornerback Mekhi Blackmon, who handled being targeted by Stanford 10 times during the Trojans' win over the Cardinal.

media:content.media:description: Southern California cornerback Mekhi Blackmon warms up during an NCAA college football practice Tuesday, April 5, 2022, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Marcio Jose Sanchez)

item.title: CIF section commissioners begin push to launch flag football for girls
item.dc:creator: Eric Sondheimer
item.description: Vicky Lagos of the City Section is one of several California Interscholastic Federation commissioners who endorse flag football as a sport for girls.
item.content:encoded: Vicky Lagos of the City Section is one of several California Interscholastic Federation commissioners who endorse flag football as a sport for girls.

item.title: How to watch 'Thursday Night Football' on Amazon Prime Video
item.dc:creator: Stephen Battaglio
item.description: Here is what users should know about the first NFL package shown exclusively on a streaming video platform.
item.content:encoded: Here is what users should know about the first NFL package shown exclusively on a streaming video platform.

item.title: Latinx curlers find a home on ice and push for their Olympic moments
item.dc:creator: Kevin Baxter
item.description: Athletes from Mexico and Puerto Rico have dreams of competing in the Winter Olympics in curling.
item.content:encoded: Athletes from Mexico and Puerto Rico have dreams of competing in the Winter Olympics in curling.

media:content.media:description: OAKLAND, CA - JUNE 10: Instructor Adriana Camarena, 51, center, of San Francisco, who is a member of the Mexican curling team, demonstrates to students how to deliver a stone in a Learn to Curl lesson at the San Francisco Bay Area Curling Club on Friday, June 10, 2022 in Oakland, CA. (Gary Coronado / Los Angeles Times)
